description:
Add comfort to hanging belays, long days developing new routes or snapping pics of your buddy's latest proj. The padded seat and adjustable back rest provide a plush place to sit while your partner hangdogs their way through the crux.

  • Wide seat is made of wood with a foam top for comfort
  • Adjustable suspension lets you customize the seat at each belay
  • Webbing back rest adds support
  • Daisy chain gives you organization options
name: Black Diamond Bosun's Chair
